messages.content: You are a risk extraction engine. Output ONLY valid JSON with schema: {findings:[{category,type,severity,description,evidence:{doc,field_or_quote},confidence}], risk_score_delta}.

Context:
DOC: Supplier Contract A
Termination for Convenience: vendor may terminate with 30 days notice.
Auto-renewal requires 90 days opt-out.
Liability cap limited to last 3 months fees.

Task: Extract risks.

{"findings":[{"category":"LEGAL","type":"TERMINATION_FOR_CONVENIENCE","severity":"HIGH","description":"Vendor can terminate for convenience with only 30 days notice, increasing continuity risk.","evidence":{"doc":"Supplier Contract A","field_or_quote":"Termination for Convenience: vendor may terminate with 30 days notice."},"confidence":0.86},{"category":"LEGAL","type":"AUTO_RENEWAL_OPT_OUT","severity":"MEDIUM","description":"Auto-renewal requires 90-day opt-out window; missed window can lock buyer into renewal.","evidence":{"doc":"Supplier Contract A","field_or_quote":"auto-renewal ... notice at least 90 days before renewal"},"confidence":0.8},{"category":"LEGAL","type":"LIABILITY_CAP_RESTRICTIVE","severity":"MEDIUM","description":"Liability cap limited to last 3 months fees may be insufficient for material breaches.","evidence":{"doc":"Supplier Contract A","field_or_quote":"liability ... shall not exceed fees paid in the last 3 months"},"confidence":0.74}],"risk_score_delta":12}
You are a risk extraction engine. Output ONLY valid JSON with schema: {findings:[{category,type,severity,description,evidence:{doc,field_or_quote},confidence}], risk_score_delta}.

Context:
DOC: Q3 Financial Summary
Revenue: $5M, COGS: $2.9M, OpEx: $1.85M, EBITDA: $650K
Operating Expenses mismatch: summary says $1,850,000 but table shows $1,650,000
Cash burn increased 35% vs Q2
DSO: 72 days (up from 58)

Task: Extract risks.

{"findings":[{"category":"FINANCIAL","type":"OPEX_MISMATCH","severity":"HIGH","description":"Operating expenses differ between summary ($1,850,000) and detailed table ($1,650,000) - a $200,000 discrepancy requiring reconciliation.","evidence":{"doc":"Q3 Financial Summary","field_or_quote":"Table shows Operating Expenses as 1,650,000 USD (potential mismatch)"},"confidence":0.92},{"category":"FINANCIAL","type":"CASH_BURN_INCREASE","severity":"MEDIUM","description":"Cash burn increased 35% compared to Q2 due to expansion costs, potentially unsustainable.","evidence":{"doc":"Q3 Financial Summary","field_or_quote":"Cash burn increased 35% compared to Q2"},"confidence":0.85},{"category":"FINANCIAL","type":"DSO_DETERIORATION","severity":"MEDIUM","description":"Days Sales Outstanding increased from 58 to 72 days, indicating collection efficiency issues.","evidence":{"doc":"Q3 Financial Summary","field_or_quote":"DSO: 72 days, up from 58 days in Q2"},"confidence":0.88}],"risk_score_delta":18}
